RelatedSentence: The actress was attending the premiere of Tommy Lee Jones - directed film Homesman .
The Bewakoofiyaan actress 's dramatic , full - skirted gown featured a short train .

Known to promote Indian designers too at Cannes -- last year she wore a sari - jacket designed by Anamika Khanna -- Sonam 's next appearance ( second of the scheduled six at this year 's Cannes ) will be in an Indian label .
